Text.val: Author: Juergen Paarmann
20.03.2014 SH SCR18789 Added test INVO_MARKCODESPEC = GNRL_MARKCODMAXCOMMEXCEEDED
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
09.11.2011 SH SCR16880 Step1 Changed order by on INVO to INVO_INVDATE, INVO_INVOICENO and
extended test on INVO_MARKCODESPEC with GNRL_MARKCODLIMDENIED
23.03.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
GB002 by GB902
23.10.2009 SH SCR14961 Step2/Option2 Undo changes
15.10.2009 SH SCR14961 Step2/Option2 Added substraction with INVO_AWKAI
22.07.2009 SH SCR14753 Added argument for BDC153 --> PI.ADDITIONALFINANCEH
18.02.2009 GB SCR14411 Added two parameter for call GB101
19.01.2009 SH SCR14292 Replaced temp table handling by DSQL
10.07.2007 SH SCR12691 BDC152/Step2/Option1 Undo changes
10.07.2007 SH SCR12691 BDC152/Step2/Option1 Financing will be stopped now for
concentration markcodes
14.02.2007 AK SCR12294 change financeing/buying conditions acording to new CLNT
fielsd (CLNT212_INVOICEBUYING, BUYPARTIALINVOICE and BUYINGNOTICE)
21.07.2006 SH SCR11581 BDC152 Extended test to perform Step3 to be
v.ToFinance <> 0 instead of before v.ToFinance > 0
14.07.2006 SH SCR11581 BDC152 Step2/option2 Added update of v.ToFinance
with V.BDC153.ALLOWEDFINANCE if V.BDC153.ALLOWEDFINANCE < 0
19.05.2006 SH SCR11300 BDC152 Step2/option1 Changed update of
09.03.2006 SH SCR10568 BDC152 Removed updated of INVO_MARKCODESPEC, will be
now in GB101
01.03.2006 SH SCR10511 BDC152 Set range on INVO_MARKCODESPEC =
GNRL_MARKCODLIMEXCEEDED and changed PI.INVO_MARKCODESPEC_OLD to
INVO_MARKCODESPEC for "Option 1: Finance not possible"
14.02.2006 SH SCR10413 BDC152 Step3/Part1 Removed breakpoint before call GB101
14.02.2006 SH SCR10413 BDC152 Step3/Part1 Added a breakpoint before call GB101
23.01.2006 SH SCR10173 BDC152 Extended range on INVO_MARKCODESPEC
19.01.2006 SH SCR10146 BDC152 Step2Option2 Added recal of v.ToFinance from
general to client currency, which amount is usesd as cnd to perform Step3
09.11.2005 SH SCR9258 BDC152 Step3Part1 Uses now INVO_MARKCODESPEC
from DB with a separate task, because already update in part 1 with GB101, so
the value from LinkQuery is no longer tha actual value
31.10.2005 SH SCR9258 BDC152 step3/part1 Added test if WKA amount is deducted
18.10.2005 SH SCR9258 BDC152 step2/part2 Removed one test to update v.ToFinance
10.10.2005 SH SCR9258 BDC152 step2/part2 Added update for v.ToFinance and CND to
continue with step3
22.08.2005 SH SCR8885 BDC152 step2/part2 removed tests on v.ToFinance, now part
is as it's originally specified
17.08.2005 SH SCR8865 BDC152 step2/part2 removed one test/update for v.ToFinance
11.08.2005 SH SCR8771 BDC152 step3/part1 --> Changed PI.INVO_MARKCODESPECNEW
= BDC153.PO.INVO_MARKCODESPEC (argument of GB101)
08.08.2005 SH SCR8766 BDC152 step1 --> Changed tests from 0,01 to 0,50 to set
V.ToFinance= INVA_ACTASPECIAL (both negativ and positiv test)
23.12.2004 SH SCR9945 Removed INVO_AACTUALI from SORTof INVO, see remark 02.09
02.09.2004 SH SCR9945 Added sort on INVO -> ASC INVO_INVDATE
12.08.2004 BDC152 Step3 Part 2: Removed test "and GNRL_INVOICEBUYING = Y" to
store INVOICE_BUYING_HISTORY
14.04.2004 JJ SCR5972 added SILO_TRIGGER argument to call GB101
//03-03-2004 JP request JP: change param PI.SKIP_IBHY in call to GB101 A->L
//27-02-2004 JP SCR #5482 new program BDC152
-- Set DSQL WhereClause
... individual debtor
... legal debtor

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO from :1/INVO join :1/CLNT on CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 join :1/DEBH on :4 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC in (:5,:6,:7) order by INVO_INVDATE, INVO_INVOICENO for fetch only

Text.val: -- Step 3 --> part1: Updated INVA_ACTASPECIAL
//Step 1: Select invoice to test if it can be financed
//skip this invoice (invoice is too old to buy)
// buying/finance a the whole invoice
//update with INVA_ACTASPECIAL
// partly buying of an invoice is not allowed ==> end this task
// buying/finance a part of the invoice
//update with v.ADDITIONALFINANCE
Execute only if invoice is not to be skiped and task is not to be ended
### B E G I N O F S T E P 2 ###
//Step 2: Test if selected invoice can be financed
//Option 1: Finance not possible
//Option 2: Finance possible
.. recal v.ToFinance from general currency to client currency
### E N D O F S T E P 2 ###
### B E G I N O F S T E P 3 ###
//Step 3: Finance additional invoices
//Part 1: Finance the invoice
... test if WKA amount is still deducted
(get INVA_ACTASPECIAL after updates in Part 1, see GB101)
... get actual INVO_MARKCODESPEC, because already updated in GB101, see part 1,
uses as argument for GB101
//Part 2: Store INVOICE_BUYING_HISTORY
//Part 3: Test if we can finance additional invoices
### E N D O F S T E P 3 ###
set skip invoice flag back to false
